name: The DELUXE Ashley DSLR Camera Purse™
description:
The DELUXE Ashley DSLR Camera Purse™ gives your camera and you a little extra flair! Made with designer fabrics and lined with fleece, interfacing and foam...you're sure to be a hit while having a good amount of protection for your just like a baby camera. It measures approximately 11 1/2" H x 16" L x 5" W and the straps are approximately 22" long. The interior gives two side cozy spots for extra lens and these too are lined with fleece! 

♥ The Deluxe offers a matching camera strap cover, detachable shoulder strap, padded interior pocket and a matching key loop with ring to clip it on attached to the purse! ♥

"This bag is GREAT! It is very spacious and fits my camera body with a lens and two other lenses with room to spare! The thick padding allows me to rest assured that my equipment is safe. I’m also not caught carrying a big ugly black bag during photo-shoots, rather I have this stylish bag to throw over my shoulder. The quality of the work is evident and is a must have for any photographer!" - Review done by Diary of a Devil Dog Wife from May 2011!  http://www.happinessredefined.com/2011/05/14/ashley-dsrl-camera-purse-review-and-giveaway/

♥ Please allow up to 20 BUSINESS days for your item(s) to be completed and shipped. ♥

The Ashley Purse™

The tote you love for your camera but now fashioned as an everyday purse. Made with designer fabrics and lined with interfacing to help keep the shape. It measures approximately 11 1/2" H x 16" L x 5" W and the straps are approximately 22" long. Secured closed with a magnetic closure.

name: The Kayla Camera Purse™
description:
The Kayla Camera Purse™...perfect for when you're on the go! It's tapered design allows for your camera with lens attached can go in facing down with no movement on the sides. Made with designer fabrics and lined with fleece, interfacing and foam...allowing for easy quick, easy and fashionable access with all the safety! There are two fleece interfaced pockets inside to allow room for keys, business cards, cell phones, etc. Adjustable & detachable shoulder strap allows you to carry your camera purse along in comfort!

Approximate measurements
Top 9 1/2" x 4"
Height 8 1/2"
Bottom 7 1/2" x 5 1/2"

♥ Please allow up to 20 BUSINESS days for your item(s) to be completed and shipped. ♥

The Kayla Purse™

The purse you love for your camera but now fashioned as an everyday purse. Made with designer fabrics and lined with interfacing to help keep the shape.

There are two interfaced pockets inside to allow room for keys, business cards, cell phones, etc. Adjustable & detachable shoulder strap allows you to carry your purse in comfort!

Bottom 7 1/2" x 5 1/2"

name: The Ashley Purse™
description:
The tote you love for your camera but now fashioned as an everyday purse or even as a stylist diaper bag. Made with designer fabrics and lined with interfacing to help keep the shape. 

Full size - It measures approximately 11 1/2" H x 16" L x 5" W and the straps are approximately 22" long. Secured closed with a magnetic closure.

Mini size - It measures approximately 9" H x 13" L x 3" W and the straps are approximately 21 1/2" long.  Double pocket inside with a section perfect for a bottle or a drink!

♥ Please allow up to 10-15 BUSINESS days for your item(s) to be completed and shipped. ♥

name: Padded Camera Strap Cover
description:
Here's a fun way to express yourself that much more! Decorate your camera strap with something fitting to your style or mood while protecting your neck with a nice fleece cushion! This reversible strap gives you two styles in one! 

The camera strap cover slips over most SLR/DSLR straps. The slipcover is approximately 2 1/2" wide and 26" long. It's made with 100% cotton fabric with fleece lining the center of both sides making even the comfort reversible! Also this strap includes a small pocket to fit your lens caps (up to 2 1/2" in diameter) or business cards!

♥ Please allow up to 10 - 15 BUSINESS days for your item(s) to be completed and shipped. ♥
